Shelley marks the start of Cardano's journey towards becoming a fully decentralized platform. The ability to delegate your stake and earn real ada rewards is central to the Incentivized Testnet. Want to find out more? Head to:  https://t.co/a0LEGNNSjF #Shelley #Cardano  https://t.co/c21vogiL28

By the way, this #Ethereum vs #Cardano talk is such a joke.   Do you guys even understand how many Fortune 1000 and publicly traded companies around the globe are building on #Ethereum?   Just stop embarrassing yourselves 😏

It may be difficult to maintain decentralization in the long term. #Cardano tries that via the concept of pool saturation. However, people still delegate inappropriately and lose their profits.  Read how to delegate profitably:  https://t.co/lQnOY9thds  $ada #blockchain #crypto

If you delegate 10,000 $ada to a #Cardano pool close to #saturation, the reward is ~3,8 ada per epoch. You can earn a similar profit by delegating to smaller pools.  If you delegate 10,000 ada to a saturated pool with stake 2,5%, the reward could be only ~1,52 ada per epoch.  https://t.co/UIyDBM0wqY

#cardano is alive and kicking. We have had more uptime on testnet in the last few weeks than the #iota mainnet.  Cardano, a decentralised beast by design.  "We go for number one"

No matter how much you love #cardano, always remember to be diversified and never invest more than you can afford. Otherwise you will be forced to sell when you should be accumulating.  Stay safe out there and once all the weak hands are washed out.. 🚀🌕
